Summary: Saw a spinning dark object moving quickly across the sky
divs: Sighting DetailsThe sun was beginning to go down and I was outside with my cousins taking videos of various things like cars passing by and each other, when one of my cousins noticed a dark spinning object moving quickly from southwest to northeast. One of my other cousins had the video camera and started to take the video. Before we started recording the object was spinning, but stopped right about the time he started filming. There was no sound, and we did not see any clouds, planes, or other objects in the sky at this time. One of my cousins thought it might be a balloon, but me and my other cousin did not think it was a balloon. It was a warm day and there was no wind, so if it was a balloon I don't think it would be moving that fast and straight. We watched the object until it disappeared over the tree line.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Folsom
There were no other sightings in Folsom on or around July 7th 2012
